title: Influence of Drug-Polymer Interactions on Release Kinetics of PLGA and PLA/PET Nanoparticles
summary: The study investigates how drug-polymer interactions affect release kinetics in poly(lactic-co-glycolic acid) (PLGA) and polylactide-co-ethylene glycol (PLA/PEG) nanoparticles, aiming to develop more effective antimicrobial drug delivery systems.
results: The results section of the poster does not provide any specific numerical measurements or detailed outcomes related to drug-polymer interactions on release kinetics of PLGA and PLA/PEG nanoparticles. The abstract focuses on introducing the topic but lacks concrete data points.
